tool_description: Detect and censor bad words in text, providing a censored version of the input text with profanity replaced by asterisks.

api_list.name: /v1/profanityfilter
api_list.description: API Ninjas Profanity Filter API endpoint. Returns the censored version of any given text and indicates whether the text contains profanity.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Input text to be filtered for profanity. Maximum length is 1000 characters.
